h2_title: Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: However, the most dire of his attacks will come when he seems to emit even more electricity coming from his mouth and arcing around his body. Listen carefully to the drumbeat of the music, as he’ll start to pound the very earth in time with the drum beats, causing several rings of electric energy to expel outward.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Black Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
However, the most dire of his attacks will come when he seems to emit even more electricity coming from his mouth and arcing around his body. Listen carefully to the drumbeat of the music, as he’ll start to pound the very earth in time with the drum beats, causing several rings of electric energy to expel outward.
